pokemon-api.name: Pokemon API
pokemon-api.description: Comprehensive Pokemon API providing detailed data on Pokemon, moves, abilities, types, and more from all generations of the Pokemon universe.

features.title: Complete Pokemon Data
features.description: Access detailed information about all Pokemon including stats, types, abilities, moves, and evolution chains.

features.title: Move Database
features.description: Comprehensive move data including power, accuracy, type, and effect descriptions for all Pokemon moves.

features.title: Type System
features.description: Complete type effectiveness data and relationships between different Pokemon types.

features.title: Generation Support
features.description: Data from all Pokemon generations including the latest games and regions.

useCases.title: Pokemon Games
useCases.description: Build Pokemon-themed games with accurate data for moves, types, and battle mechanics.

useCases.title: Educational Apps
useCases.description: Create learning applications that teach about Pokemon types, evolution, and characteristics.

zelda-api.name: Zelda API
zelda-api.description: Comprehensive API for The Legend of Zelda universe, including characters, items, and quests from all games in the series.

features.title: Character Database
features.description: Access detailed information about all Zelda characters, their roles, and appearances across games.

features.title: Item Catalog
features.description: Complete database of weapons, tools, and items from the Zelda universe.

useCases.title: Zelda Games
useCases.description: Build Zelda-themed games and applications with authentic character and item data.

marvel-api.name: Marvel API
marvel-api.description: Official Marvel Comics API providing access to characters, comics, stories, and events from the Marvel Universe.

features.title: Character Database
features.description: Access detailed information about Marvel characters, their powers, and comic appearances.

features.title: Comic Archive
features.description: Browse Marvel's extensive comic book collection with metadata and cover images.

useCases.title: Comic Apps
useCases.description: Build applications for browsing and discovering Marvel comics and characters.

github-api.name: GitHub API
github-api.description: Access GitHub repositories, issues, pull requests, and user data for development tools and integrations.

features.title: Repository Management
features.description: Access repository data, commits, branches, and pull requests.

features.title: User Data
features.description: Get user profiles, followers, and activity information.

features.title: Issue Tracking
features.description: Manage issues, labels, and project boards.

useCases.title: Development Tools
useCases.description: Build tools for code analysis, CI/CD, and project management.

jsonplaceholder.name: JSONPlaceholder
jsonplaceholder.description: Fake REST API for testing and prototyping. Perfect for frontend developers who need mock data.

features.title: Mock Data
features.description: Provides realistic JSON data for posts, users, comments, and albums.

features.title: REST Operations
features.description: Supports GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, and DELETE operations for testing.

useCases.title: Prototyping
useCases.description: Perfect for frontend developers who need mock data for testing and prototyping.

stripe-api.name: Stripe API
stripe-api.description: Complete payment processing platform with support for credit cards, digital wallets, and international payments.

features.title: Payment Processing
features.description: Accept credit cards, digital wallets, and bank transfers.

features.title: Subscription Management
features.description: Handle recurring billing and subscription lifecycle.

useCases.title: E-commerce
useCases.description: Build online stores with secure payment processing.

paypal-api.name: PayPal API
paypal-api.description: PayPal's payment processing API for accepting payments, managing subscriptions, and handling refunds.

features.title: Payment Processing
features.description: Accept PayPal payments, credit cards, and alternative payment methods.

features.title: Subscription Management
features.description: Handle recurring payments and subscription billing.

useCases.title: E-commerce
useCases.description: Integrate PayPal payments into online stores and applications.

spotify-api.name: Spotify Web API
spotify-api.description: Access Spotify music catalog, user playlists, and audio features for music applications.

features.title: Music Catalog
features.description: Access Spotify's vast library of songs, albums, and artists.

features.title: User Playlists
features.description: Manage user playlists, saved tracks, and listening history.

useCases.title: Music Apps
useCases.description: Build music discovery and playlist management applications.

lastfm-api.name: Last.fm API
lastfm-api.description: Access Last.fm's music database, user listening history, and music recommendation data.

features.title: Music Scrobbling
features.description: Track user listening habits and music preferences.

features.title: Music Discovery
features.description: Get personalized music recommendations and similar artists.

useCases.title: Music Analytics
useCases.description: Build applications that analyze music listening patterns and preferences.

twitter-api.name: Twitter API
twitter-api.description: Access Twitter's official API to post tweets, read timelines, manage followers, and integrate Twitter functionality.

features.title: Tweet Management
features.description: Post tweets, read timelines, and manage tweet content programmatically.

features.title: User Data
features.description: Access user profiles, followers, following lists, and user statistics.

useCases.title: Social Media Management
useCases.description: Build tools to manage multiple Twitter accounts, schedule posts, and track engagement.

instagram-api.name: Instagram Basic Display API
instagram-api.description: Access Instagram user media, profile information, and basic display functionality for Instagram integration.

features.title: Media Access
features.description: Access user photos and videos from their Instagram account.

features.title: Profile Data
features.description: Get user profile information and basic statistics.

useCases.title: Social Media Apps
useCases.description: Build applications that display Instagram content and integrate with Instagram features.

openweathermap.name: OpenWeatherMap API
openweathermap.description: Comprehensive weather data API providing current conditions, forecasts, and historical weather data.

features.title: Current Weather
features.description: Get real-time weather conditions including temperature, humidity, wind speed, and atmospheric pressure.

features.title: Weather Forecasts
features.description: Access 5-day and 16-day weather forecasts with detailed hourly predictions.

useCases.title: Weather Apps
useCases.description: Build mobile and web applications that display current weather and forecasts.

weather-api.name: WeatherAPI
weather-api.description: Fast and reliable weather data API with current conditions, forecasts, and historical weather information.

features.title: Real-time Weather
features.description: Get current weather conditions for any location worldwide.

features.title: Extended Forecasts
features.description: Access 3-day, 7-day, and 14-day weather forecasts.

useCases.title: Weather Services
useCases.description: Build weather applications and integrate weather data into existing services.
